message: @ericflo said he liked stories with long arcs and this show is one of my favorites for that
best mystery show on TV, ever
Seriously?  I always wrote this show off...didnt know there was anything to it.
yeah. it's darkly funny and incredibly witty
covers all the familiar high school issues + much more adult ones
each episode has its own "mystery" with an overarching mystery across whole seasons
Awesome--I'll have to put it on the list of shows to check out whenever I get some free time.
